00010 NiftiArmNode::NiftiArmNode() {
00011         operating = true;
00012         manual = false;
00013         homing = false;
00014         height = 0;
00015         nominal_angle = 0;
00016         IMU_angle = 0;

00024 void NiftiArmNode::publishStatus() {
00025         double alpha, beta;
00026         alpha = epos_get_position(&MC_1) - dimensions.home_angle_shoulder;
00027         beta = epos_get_position(&MC_2) - dimensions.home_angle_elbow;
00028         n_status->position_elbow = alpha;
00029         n_status->position_shoulder = beta;
00030         nifti_arm_msgs::msg_position position_m;
00031         position_m.a = alpha;
00032         position_m.b = beta;
00033         pubPosition.publish(position_m);
00034         tf::Transform tf_shoulder, tf_elbow, tf_hand, tf_cam, tf_ptu, tf_ptu_joint;
00035         tf_shoulder.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, -alpha, 0));
00036         tf_shoulder.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, dimensions.mounting_height / 1000));
00037         tf_cam.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, alpha, 0));
00038         tf_cam.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(dimensions.length_upper_arm / 1000, 0.05, 0));
00039         tf_elbow.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, -(PI - (beta)), 0));
00040         tf_elbow.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(dimensions.length_upper_arm / 1000, 0, 0));
00041         tf_hand.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, PI - beta + alpha, 0));
00042         tf_hand.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(dimensions.length_lower_arm / 1000, 0, 0));
00043         tf_ptu.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, 0, 0));
00044         tf_ptu.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, dimensions.ptu_height_camera / 1000));
00045         tf_ptu_joint.setRotation(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, tilt_angle,
00046                         pan_angle));
00047         tf_ptu_joint.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, dimensions.ptu_height / 1000));
00048 
00049         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_ptu, ros::Time::now(),
00050                         "ptu_joint", "ptu_mounting"));
00051         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_shoulder, ros::Time::now(),
00052                         "base_arm", "shoulder"));
00053         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_elbow, ros::Time::now(),
00054                         "shoulder", "elbow"));
00055         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_cam, ros::Time::now(),
00056                         "shoulder", "elbow_mounting"));
00057         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_hand, ros::Time::now(),
00058                         "elbow", "hand"));
00059         tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tf_ptu_joint, ros::Time::now(),
00060                         "hand", "ptu_joint"));
00061 
00062         nifti_arm_msgs::msg_current current_m;
00063         curr1 = elmo_get_current(&MC_1.dev);
00064         curr2 = elmo_get_current(&MC_2.dev);
00065         current_m.a = curr1;
00066         current_m.b = curr2;
00067         n_status->current_shoulder = curr1;
00068         n_status->current_elbow = curr2;
00069         pubCurrent.publish(current_m);
00070         if (manual) n_status->status = Manual;
00071         if (!operating) n_status->status = Deactivated;
00072         if (homing) n_status->status = Homing;
00073         updater->update();
00074 }
00075 
00076 int NiftiArmNode::adoptPosition(void) {
00077         if (!(!operating || manual)) {
00078                 n_status->internal_height = height;
00079                 n_status->height = (height + dimensions.mounting_height
00080                                 + dimensions.ptu_height + dimensions.ptu_height_camera);
00081                 epos_position_profile_t profileMC_shoulder, profileMC_elbow;
00082                 ROS_DEBUG("Height: %fmm (%dmm)", (height + dimensions.mounting_height
00083                                 + dimensions.ptu_height + dimensions.ptu_height_camera), height);
00084                 double alpha, vel_alpha, vel_beta, beta;
00085                 if (height > dimensions.length_upper_arm + dimensions.length_lower_arm) {
00086                         ROS_ERROR(
00087                                         "Height is to big. Skipping the command; (Height: %fmm; Alpha: %f; Beta: %f)",
00088                                         (height + dimensions.mounting_height
00089                                                         + dimensions.ptu_height
00090                                                         + dimensions.ptu_height_camera), rad_to_deg(alpha),
00091                                         rad_to_deg(beta));
00092                         updater->broadcast(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::ERROR, "Height is to big. Skipping the command;");
00093                         return 1;
00094                 }
00095                 calculateAngles(alpha, beta); //Calculating the angles
00096                 alpha = alpha + dimensions.home_angle_shoulder; //Adding the home-angle
00097                 beta = beta + dimensions.home_angle_elbow;
00098                 if (height < ((dimensions.length_lower_arm * sin(
00099                                 -dimensions.home_angle_elbow)) + (dimensions.length_upper_arm
00100                                 * sin(-dimensions.home_angle_shoulder)))) {
00101                         if (height != 0)
00102                                 ROS_INFO(
00103                                                 "Height is to small. (Height: %dmm; Alpha: %f; Beta: %f) Setting height to Zero.",
00104                                                 height, rad_to_deg(alpha), rad_to_deg(beta));
00105                         updater->broadcast(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::ERROR, "Height is to small. Setting height to Zero.");
00106                         alpha = 0;
00107                         beta = 0;
00108                 }
00109                 if (alpha > deg_to_rad(105)) {
00110                         ROS_ERROR("Position not reachable. Skip.");
00111                         updater->broadcast(diagnostic_msgs::DiagnosticStatus::ERROR, "Height is not reachable. Skip.");
00112                         return 1;
00113                 }
00114                 if (beta < 0) {
00115                         beta = 0;
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 vel_alpha = (epos_get_position(&MC_1) - (alpha)) / (epos_get_position(
00119                                 &MC_2) - (beta));
00120                 if (vel_alpha < 0)
00121                         vel_alpha = -vel_alpha;
00122                 if (isnan(vel_alpha)) {
00123                         vel_alpha = dimensions.max_vel;
00124                         vel_beta = dimensions.max_vel;
00125                 } else if (vel_alpha > 1) {
00126                         vel_beta = dimensions.max_vel / vel_alpha;
00127                         if (isnan(vel_beta))
00128                                 vel_beta = dimensions.max_vel;
00129                         vel_alpha = dimensions.max_vel;
00130                 } else {
00131                         vel_alpha = dimensions.max_vel * vel_alpha;
00132                         vel_beta = dimensions.max_vel;
00133                 }
00134                 ROS_DEBUG("Vel: Alpha: %f, Beta %f", vel_alpha, vel_beta);
00135 
00136                 //Starting Profile
00137                 epos_position_profile_init(&profileMC_shoulder, alpha, vel_alpha,
00138                                 (float) (490000 / 360 * PI), (float) (490000 / 360 * PI),
00139                                 epos_profile_linear);
00140                 profileMC_shoulder.relative = 0;
00141                 epos_position_profile_init(&profileMC_elbow, beta, vel_beta,
00142                                 (float) (490000.0 / 360.0 * PI), (float) (490000.0 / 360 * PI),
00143                                 epos_profile_linear);
00144                 profileMC_elbow.relative = 0;
00145                 epos_position_profile_start(&MC_1, &profileMC_shoulder);
00146                 epos_position_profile_start(&MC_2, &profileMC_elbow);
00147                 /*if (height == 0) {
00148                  while ((!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_1.dev)
00149                  & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))
00150                  || (!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_2.dev)
00151                  & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))) {
00152                  prate->sleep();
00153                  //this->publishStatus();
00154                  }
00155                  epos_device_shutdown(&MC_1.dev);
00156                  epos_device_shutdown(&MC_2.dev);
00157                  }*/
00158 
00159                 return 0; //Succeed
00160         }
00161         return 2;
00162 }

00164 void NiftiArmNode::currentControl() {
00165         if (((curr1 + curr2) > 2.5) || (curr1 > 1.2) || (curr2 > 1.2)) {
00166                 this->floatMotors();
00167                 ROS_ERROR("Current limit reached (%.2fA|%.2fA). Stopping Motors.",
00168                                 curr1, curr2);
00169                 operating = false;
00170         }
00171 }
00172 
00173 void NiftiArmNode::position_error_Control() {
00174         double pos1, pos2;
00175         pos1 = elmo_get_position_error(&MC_1);
00176         pos2 = elmo_get_position_error(&MC_2);
00177         if (pos1 > dimensions.max_position_error) {
00178                 epos_device_shutdown(&MC_1.dev);
00179                 ROS_ERROR(
00180                                 "Position error limit reached (%.2f degrees|%.2f degrees). Stopping Motors.",
00181                                 rad_to_deg(pos1), rad_to_deg(pos2));
00182                 if (operating) {
00183                         epos_position_profile_t profileMC;
00184                         epos_position_profile_init(&profileMC, 0, dimensions.max_vel,
00185                                         (float) (490000 / 360 * PI), (float) (490000 / 360 * PI),
00186                                         epos_profile_linear);
00187                         profileMC.relative = 0;
00188                         epos_position_profile_start(&MC_2, &profileMC);
00189                 }
00190                 operating = false;
00191         }
00192         if (pos2 > dimensions.max_position_error) {
00193                 ROS_ERROR(
00194                                 "Position error limit reached (%.2f degrees|%.2f degrees). Stopping Motors.",
00195                                 rad_to_deg(pos1), rad_to_deg(pos2));
00196                 epos_device_shutdown(&MC_2.dev);
00197                 if (operating) {
00198                         epos_position_profile_t profileMC;
00199                         epos_position_profile_init(&profileMC, 0, dimensions.max_vel,
00200                                         (float) (490000 / 360 * PI), (float) (490000 / 360 * PI),
00201                                         epos_profile_linear);
00202                         profileMC.relative = 0;
00203                         epos_position_profile_start(&MC_1, &profileMC);
00204                 }
00205                 operating = false;
00206         }
00207 }
00208 
00209 void NiftiArmNode::floatMotors() {
00210         epos_device_shutdown(&MC_1.dev);
00211         epos_device_shutdown(&MC_2.dev);
00212 }

00214 int NiftiArmNode::initialize() {
00215         n_status->status = Initializing;
00216         getRosParameters();
00217         pubCurrent = n->advertise<nifti_arm_msgs::msg_current> ("/arm/current", 1);
00218         pubPosition = n->advertise<nifti_arm_msgs::msg_position> ("/arm/position",
00219                         1);
00220         subOnlyHeight = n->subscribe("arm/height", 1,
00221                         &NiftiArmNode::onlyHeightCallback, this);
00222         subAngle = n->subscribe("arm/angle", 1, &NiftiArmNode::angleCallback, this);
00223         subActivate = n->subscribe("arm/activate", 1,
00224                         &NiftiArmNode::activateCallback, this);
00225         subStop = n->subscribe("arm/stop", 1, &NiftiArmNode::stopCallback, this);
00226         subHome = n->subscribe("arm/home", 1, &NiftiArmNode::homeCallback, this);
00227         subCalibrate = n->subscribe("arm/calibrate", 1,
00228                         &NiftiArmNode::calibrateCallback, this);
00229         ROS_INFO("Listening on %s for IMU-Data", canSettings.IMU_topic.c_str());
00230         subIMU = n->subscribe(canSettings.IMU_topic, 1, &NiftiArmNode::IMUCallback,
00231                         this);
00232         subPan = n->subscribe("/pan_controller/state", 1,
00233                         &NiftiArmNode::PanCallback, this);
00234         subTilt = n->subscribe("/tilt_controller/state", 1,
00235                         &NiftiArmNode::TiltCallback, this);
00236         subManualActivate = n->subscribe("arm/manualActivate", 1,
00237                         &NiftiArmNode::manualActivateCallback, this);
00238         subManualPosition = n->subscribe("arm/manualPosition", 1,
00239                         &NiftiArmNode::manualPositionCallback, this);
00240         config_t config;
00241         param_t param;
00242         //Initialize CAN-bus
00243         ROS_INFO("Opening Can-Interface (%s) with %d000 baud/s",
00244                         canSettings.CanDeviceFile.c_str(), canSettings.CanBaudrate);
00245         config_init(&config);
00246         param_init_int(&param, "bitrate", canSettings.CanBaudrate);
00247         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00248         param_init_string(&param, "usb-dev", canSettings.CanDeviceFile.c_str());
00249         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00250         can_init(&can_dev, &config);
00251         config_destroy(&config);
00252 
00253         //Initialize motorcontroller
00254         if (initializeMotorControllerDevice(&MC_1, canSettings.node_id_shoulder,
00255                         &can_dev)) {
00256                 n->shutdown();
00257                 return 1;
00258         }
00259         if (initializeMotorControllerDevice(&MC_2, canSettings.node_id_elbow,
00260                         &can_dev)) {
00261                 epos_close(&MC_1);
00262                 epos_destroy(&MC_1);
00263                 n->shutdown();
00264                 return 1;
00265         }
00266         n_status->status = Ok;
00267         home();
00268         return 0;
00269 }
00270 
00271 void NiftiArmNode::home(void) {
00272         tStatus old_status;
00273         homing = true;
00274         old_status = n_status->status;
00275         n_status->status = Homing;
00276         int height_old;
00277         height_old = height;
00278         height = 200;
00279         adoptPosition();
00280         operating = false;
00281         while (((!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_1.dev) & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))
00282                         || (!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_2.dev)
00283                                         & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))) && n->ok()) {
00284                 prate->sleep();
00285                 this->publishStatus();
00286                 this->position_error_Control();
00287                 //this->publishStatus();
00288                 //ros::spinOnce();
00289         }
00290         ROS_INFO("Start Homing shoulder");
00291         elmo_start_homing(&MC_1, dimensions.home_vel, (int)(490000.0 / 360 * PI),
00292                         0, ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_RIGHT);
00293         elmo_wait_homed(&MC_1.dev, prate, this);
00294         ROS_INFO("Finished Homing shoulder");
00295         ROS_INFO("Start Homing elbow");
00296         elmo_start_homing(&MC_2, dimensions.home_vel, (int)(490000.0 / 360 * PI),
00297                         0, ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_LEFT);
00298         elmo_wait_homed(&MC_2.dev, prate, this);
00299         ROS_INFO("Finished Homing elbow");
00300         operating = true;
00301         height = height_old;
00302         homing = false;
00303         n_status->status = old_status;
00304         adoptPosition();
00305 }
00306 
00307 void NiftiArmNode::calculateAngles(double &alpha, double &beta) {
00308         double a, b;
00309         a = dimensions.length_upper_arm;
00310         b = dimensions.length_lower_arm;
00311 
00312         if ((height * height) > ((a * a) - (b * b))) {
00313                 alpha
00314                                 = asin(((height * height) + (a * a) - (b * b)) / (2 * height
00315                                                 * a));
00316                 beta = acos(cos(alpha) * a / b) + alpha;
00317         } else {
00318                 ROS_INFO("Using approximation of the angles.");
00319                 alpha = asin(height / a / 2);
00320                 beta = 2 * alpha;
00321         }
00322         alpha = alpha + IMU_angle + nominal_angle; //Adding the angle of the IMU and the nominal angle
00323         if ((beta - alpha) < deg_to_rad(2.5)) {
00324                 ROS_INFO("Using approximation of the angles.");
00325                 alpha = asin(height / a / 2) + IMU_angle + nominal_angle;
00326                 beta = 2 * asin(height / b / 2);
00327         }
00328         if (((beta - alpha) < deg_to_rad(2.5)) && (beta != 0 || alpha != 0)) {
00329                 ROS_ERROR(
00330                                 "Position not reachable. Setting height to Zero. Alpha: %f, Beta %f",
00331                                 rad_to_deg(alpha), rad_to_deg(beta));
00332                 alpha = 0;
00333                 beta = 0;
00334         }
00335         /*if (alpha < 0) {
00336          ROS_INFO("Angles too small; alpha %f; beta %f", rad_to_deg(alpha),
00337          rad_to_deg(beta));
00338          beta = 2 * PI - beta - (alpha - IMU_angle);
00339          alpha = PI + alpha;
00340          if (beta > (2 * PI - 2 * dimensions.home_angle_elbow))
00341          beta = 2 * PI - 2 * dimensions.home_angle_elbow - 0.05;
00342          }*/
00343 }
00344 
00345 void NiftiArmNode::shutdown(void) {
00346         int count = 0;
00347         height = 0;
00348         adoptPosition();
00349         while (((!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_1.dev) & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))
00350                         || (!(epos_device_get_status(&MC_2.dev)
00351                                         & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED))) && (++count < 20
00352                         * LOOP_RATE)) {
00353                 prate->sleep();
00354         }
00355         if (count >= 20 * LOOP_RATE)
00356                 ROS_INFO("Timout during shutdown.");
00357         epos_device_shutdown(&MC_1.dev);
00358         epos_device_shutdown(&MC_2.dev);
00359         epos_close(&MC_1);
00360         epos_destroy(&MC_1);
00361         epos_close(&MC_2);
00362         epos_destroy(&MC_2);
00363         n->shutdown();
00364 }

00366 void NiftiArmNode::getRosParameters(void) {
00367         if (!n->getParam("/arm/can/Interface", canSettings.CanDeviceFile)
00368                         || !n->getParam("/arm/can/bitrate", canSettings.CanBaudrate)
00369                         || !n->getParam("/arm/motor1/node_id", canSettings.node_id_shoulder)
00370                         || !n->getParam("/arm/motor2/node_id", canSettings.node_id_elbow)
00371                         || !n->getParam("/arm/constants/maximal_velocity",
00372                                         dimensions.max_vel) || !n->getParam(
00373                         "/arm/constants/homing_velocity", dimensions.home_vel)
00374                         || !n->getParam("/arm/IMU/topic_name", canSettings.IMU_topic)
00375                         || !n->getParam("/arm/IMU/axis", canSettings.IMU_axis)
00376                         || !n->getParam("/arm/IMU/inverted", canSettings.IMU_inverted)) {
00377                 ROS_ERROR("Couldn't get all parameters. Abort.");
00378                 this->shutdown();
00379         } else {
00380                 //ROS_INFO("Got all parameters.");
00381         }
00382         if (!n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/length_a", dimensions.length_upper_arm)
00383                         || !n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/length_b",
00384                                         dimensions.length_lower_arm) || !n->getParam(
00385                         "/arm/dimensions/home_angle_a", dimensions.home_angle_shoulder)
00386                         || !n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/home_angle_b",
00387                                         dimensions.home_angle_elbow) || !n->getParam(
00388                         "/arm/dimensions/mounting_height", dimensions.mounting_height)
00389                         || !n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/ptu_height", dimensions.ptu_height)
00390                         || !n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/ptu_height_camera",
00391                                         dimensions.ptu_height_camera)
00392                         || !n->getParam("/arm/dimensions/max_position_error",
00393                                         dimensions.max_position_error)) {
00394                 ROS_ERROR("Couldn't get all dimensions. Using the default ones.");
00395                 dimensions.length_upper_arm = 500.0;
00396                 dimensions.length_lower_arm = 450.0;
00397                 dimensions.home_angle_shoulder = 0;
00398                 dimensions.home_angle_elbow = 0;
00399                 dimensions.mounting_height = 0;
00400                 dimensions.ptu_height = 0;
00401                 dimensions.ptu_height_camera = 0;
00402                 dimensions.max_vel = 0.3;
00403                 dimensions.max_position_error = 0.087;
00404         }
00405         canSettings.IMU_angle_offset = 0;
00406         canSettings.setoffset = false;
00407 }
